name: TidalWave Interactive
tag_list: social-media, advertising, facebook, marketing-tool, contest, technology
overview:
TidalWave allows organizations to create and promote Social Media Applications to engage fans and customers without the need for professional services or the support of an IT staff. It gives organizations of any size a do-it-yourself (DIY) platform for quickly creating marketing, customer support and social commerce applications. 

Unlike other Social Media Application platforms, TidalWave goes further than lead generation. TidalWave enables organizations to do Fan Relationship Management (FRM). FRM dynamically builds Fan Profiles based upon responses to TidalWave social media applications. By creating these Fan Profiles, organizations are able to reward Fans based upon their engagement with their brand on Social Media. 

Key Features:

Fan Relationship Management (FRM) Rapid App Creation with Easy-to-Use App Wizards WYSIWYG App  Editor Publish Tab Apps or Mobile Enabled Canvas Apps Promote Apps via Facebook and Twitter
